welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ugong, Philippines! Prepare to be enchanted by the city's natural beauty and warm hospitality. Don't miss out on our famous underground river and explore all that Ugong has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves only domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'NAIA Free WiFi' network and follow the instructions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
